archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L2)(oar) MSc2. Optimize the production
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: - Configure "What if" scenario (Shifting event, production rate increase, ...) - Optimize the planning of preventive maintenance operations to reduce the impact on manufacturing - Manage design evolution impacts (3F) to keep same performances . - Capactity to test other configurations even if another configuration is release for production - Capacities to optimize the production based on Company Golden rules (Times, Takt, standards layouts , â€¦) - Manage Sales & Operation planning to keep consistency between strategic planning and detailed planning
